{"id":810094077,"question_id":15,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"2 years, 5 months","timestamp":1664311432,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"944 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/810094077/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"18 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def threeSum(self, nums: List[int]) -> List[List[int]]:\n        nums.sort()\n        res=[]\n        \n        for i,val in enumerate(nums):\n            if i>0 and nums[i]==nums[i-1]:\n                continue\n                \n            l,r=i+1,len(nums)-1\n            while l<r:\n                threeSum=val+nums[l]+nums[r]\n                if threeSum>0:\n                    r-=1\n                elif threeSum<0:\n                    l+=1\n                else:\n                    res.append([val,nums[l],nums[r]]) \n                    l+=1\n                    while l<r and nums[l]==nums[l-1]:\n                        l+=1\n            \n                \n                    \n        return res\n                ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
